title: Teddy Overboard: A Teddy Bear Bedtime Story Picture Book
description: Embark on a wondrous journey with Teddy, a plush bear accidentally dropped into the ocean. As he floats adrift, he wonders if he'll ever see the son of the sailboat captain again. Along the way, Teddy encounters a playful dolphin, a protective octopus, curious crabs, and a helpful seagull. Each twist and turn of his adventure brings new challenges and friends.Dive into this tale of resilience, unexpected friendships, and the enduring spirit of adventure. Discover the ocean's mysteries alongside Teddy and find out if he ever makes it back to the sailboat. Perfect for young readers aged 3-8, 'Teddy Overboard' is a story that reminds us of the beauty of friendship and the magic that can be found in the most unexpected places. Featuring 20 vibrant color illustrations.This eBook includes an interactive audio narration feature, accessible with a simple click of a button. Please note that this audio playback functionality is compatible with select Kindle devices and applications that support audio features. Readers using compatible Kindle Fire tablets, as well as the Kindle apps for Android phones and tablets, can enjoy this immersive audio experience, bringing the story of 'Teddy Overboard' to life.
author: Steven Teichner
